official_title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to add certain counties in the State of Mississippi to the region represented by the Appalachian Regional Commission.

summary.text: Includes the counties of Grenada and Tallahatchie, Mississippi, in the region represented by the Appalachian Regional Commission.

titles.title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to add certain counties in the State of Mississippi to the region represented by the Appalachian Regional Commission.
